00176     public function authenticate()
00177     {
00178         $this->errorCode = self::ERROR_UNKNOWN_IDENTITY;
00179 
00180         if ( $this->_facebookApi )
00181         {
00182             $this->_session = $this->_facebookApi->getSession();
00183             $this->_me = $this->_facebookApi->api( '/me' );
00184 
00185             if ( $this->_session && $this->_me )
00186             {
00187                 $this->errorCode = self::ERROR_NONE;
00188                 $this->username = trim( $this->_me['name'] );
00189 
00190                 //  Raise our event
00191                 $this->onLoginSuccess( new CPSAuthenticationEvent( $this, $this->_me, $this ) );
00192 
00193                 return true;
00194             }
00195         }
00196 
00197         $this->onLoginFailure( new CPSAuthenticationEvent( $this, $this->_me, $this ) );
00198 
00199         return false;
00200     }

00211     public function _initialize()
00212     {
00213         //  Ignore second call and standalone...
00214         if ( PS::_gs( 'standalone', false ) || $this->_inForceLogin )
00215             return;
00216 
00217         $this->_session = $this->_facebookApi->getSession();
00218 
00219         if ( ! $this->_session )
00220         {
00221             $this->_inForceLogin = true;
00222             $this->_forceLogin();
00223         }
00224 
00225         $this->_inForceLogin = false;
00226 
00227         try
00228         {
00229             //  Get our info...
00230             $this->_me = PS::_gs( 'currentMe' );
00231 
00232             if ( null === $this->_me && ! ( $this->_me = $this->_facebookApi->api( '/me' ) ) )
00233                 throw new Exception( 'Not really logged in...' );
00234 
00235             //  Not logged in? Authenticate!
00236             if ( PS::_ig() && ! CPSFacebookUser::authenticateUser( $this->_facebookApi, $this ) )
00237                 throw new Exception( 'Invalid session' );
00238 
00239             //  Log into system...
00240             $this->_me = $this->_facebookApi->api( '/me' );
00241             $this->_fbUserId = $this->_session['uid'];
00242             $this->_accessToken = $this->_session['access_token'];
00243             $this->_firstName = PS::o( $this->_me, 'first_name' );
00244             $this->_loadUser();
00245 
00246             if ( $this->_autoLoadPictures )
00247             {
00248                 CPSFacebook::$_photoList = $this->getAlbums();
00249 
00250                 if ( empty( CPSFacebook::$_photoList ) )
00251                     PS::_rs( '_psAutoLoadPictures', '$(function(){$.get("/app/photos",function(){});});', CClientScript::POS_END );
00252             }
00253 
00254             return $this->_isConnected = true;
00255         }
00256         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00257         {
00258             CPSLog::error( __METHOD__, 'FB Exception: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00259             error_log( 'init exception: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00260             $this->_forceLogin();

00270     protected function _loadUser()
00271     {
00272         $_user = null;
00273 
00274         //  NO user id? Bail!
00275         if ( empty( $this->_fbUserId ) )
00276         {
00277             CPSLog::error(__METHOD__,'FBUID EMPTY!' . $this->_fbUserId );
00278             return false;
00279         }
00280 
00281         //  Is this a new app user?
00282         $_model = call_user_func( array( $this->_userModelClass, 'model' ) );
00283 
00284         $_user = $_model->find( array(
00285             'condition' => 'pform_user_id_text = :pform_user_id_text and pform_type_code = :pform_type_code',
00286             'params' => array(
00287                 ':pform_user_id_text' => $this->_fbUserId,
00288                 ':pform_type_code' => 1000,
00289             )
00290         ));
00291 
00292         //  Not found, assume new...
00293         if ( ! $_user )
00294         {
00295             //  New user...
00296             $_user = get_class( $_model );
00297             $_user->pform_user_id_text = $this->_fbUserId;
00298             $_user->pform_type_code = 1000;
00299             $_user->app_add_date = date( 'Y-m-d h:i:s' );
00300             $_user->app_del_date = null;
00301         }
00302 
00303         //  Set new stuff
00304         $_freshness = ( $_user->session_key_text != $this->_accessToken );
00305 
00306         $_user->session_key_text = $this->_accessToken;
00307         $_user->last_visit_date = date( 'Y-m-d h:i:s' );
00308 
00309         //  User installed app this time?
00310         if ( '1' == PS::o( $_REQUEST, 'installed' ) )
00311         {
00312             $_user->app_add_date = date( 'Y-m-d h:i:s' );
00313             $_user->app_del_date = null;
00314             $_user->app_add_count_nbr += 1;
00315 
00316             //  Invite friends?
00317             if ( $this->_inviteAfterInstall )
00318             {
00319                 $this->redirect( 'inviteFriends', true, 301 );
00320                 return false;
00321             }
00322         }
00323 
00324         if ( $this->_me )
00325         {
00326             PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::ME_CACHE, $this->_me );
00327             $_user->first_name_text = $this->_firstName;
00328             $_user->last_name_text = PS::o( $this->_me, 'last_name' );
00329             $_user->email_addr_text = PS::o( $this->_me, 'email' );
00330             $_user->full_name_text = $this->_firstName . ' ' . strtoupper( substr( PS::o( $this->_me, 'last_name' ), 0, 1 ) . '.' );
00331         }
00332 
00333         //  Clear all the caches
00334         if ( $_freshness )
00335         {
00336             PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::THUMB_CACHE, null );
00337             PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::FRIEND_CACHE, null );
00338             PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::APP_FRIEND_CACHE, null );
00339             PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::PROFILE_CACHE, null );
00340             PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::FL_CACHE, null );
00341         }
00342 
00343         //  Load app friends
00344         $this->_getAppFriends();
00345 
00346         //  Save info...
00347         $_user->save();
00348 
00349         //  Stow da ting mon
00350         $this->_id = $_user->id;
00351 
00352         //  Set our current user...
00353         PS::_ss( 'currentUser', $this->_user = $_user );
00354         PS::_ss( 'currentIdentity', $this );
00355 
00356         //  Raise the facebook login event in our controller
00357         if ( $_freshness )
00358             PS::_gc()->onFacebookLogin( new CEvent( $_user ) );
00359 
00360         return true;
00361     }

00367     protected function _getAllFriends()
00368     {
00369         $this->_friendList = PS::_gs( CPSFacebookAppController::FRIEND_CACHE );
00370 
00371         try
00372         {
00373             if ( empty( $this->_friendList ) )
00374             {
00375                 $_fql = "SELECT uid, name, first_name, pic_big, pic_square FROM user WHERE uid IN ( SELECT uid2 FROM friend where uid1 = '{$this->_fbUserId}' ) order by name";
00376                 $this->_friendList = $this->_facebookApi->api( array( 'method' => 'fql.query', 'query' => $_fql ) );
00377                 PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::FRIEND_CACHE, $this->_friendList );
00378             }
00379         }
00380         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00381         {
00382             CPSLog::error( __METHOD__, 'Exception: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00383             error_log( 'Get all friends failed: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00384             $this->_forceLogin();
00385         }
00386 
00387         return $this->_friendList;
00388     }

00394     protected function _getAppFriends()
00395     {
00396         $this->_appFriendList = ( $this->_cacheAppFriends ? PS::_gs( CPSFacebookAppController::APP_FRIEND_CACHE ) : null );
00397 
00398         try
00399         {
00400             if ( empty( $this->_appFriendList ) )
00401             {
00402                 $_fql = "select uid from user where is_app_user = '1' and uid in ( select uid2 from friend where uid1 = '{$this->_fbUserId}' ) order by name";
00403                 $_list = $this->_facebookApi->api( array( 'method' => 'fql.query', 'query' => $_fql ) );
00404 
00405                 if ( defined( 'PYE_TRACE_LEVEL' ) && PYE_TRACE_LEVEL > 3 )
00406                     CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, '  - App Friend List Retrieved: ' . print_r( $_list, true ) );
00407 
00408                 //  Make into a list of uids...
00409                 foreach ( $_list as $_friend )
00410                 {
00411                     if ( ! empty( $_friend['uid'] ) )
00412                         $this->_appFriendList[] = '\'' . $_friend['uid'] . '\'';
00413                 }
00414 
00415                 if ( $this->_cacheAppFriends )
00416                     PS::_ss( CPSFacebookAppController::APP_FRIEND_CACHE, $this->_appFriendList );
00417             }
00418         }
00419         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00420         {
00421             error_log( 'Get APP friends failed: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00422             CPSLog::error( __METHOD__, 'Exception: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00423             $this->_forceLogin();
00424         }
00425 
00426         return $this->_appFriendList;
00427     }

00433     public function getAlbums( $id = null )
00434     {
00435         static $_inProgress = false;
00436 
00437         $_model = call_user_func( array( $this->_userModelClass, 'model' ) );
00438 
00439         if ( null !== ( $_user = $_model->find( ':pform_user_id_text = pform_user_id_text', array( ':pform_user_id_text' => $this->_fbUserId ) ) ) )
00440             CPSFacebook::$_photoList = json_decode( $_user->photo_cache_text, true );
00441 
00442         if ( $_inProgress ) return CPSFacebook::$_photoList;
00443 
00444         if ( empty( CPSFacebook::$_photoList ) )
00445         {
00446             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Reloading photo cache...' );
00447             $_inProgress = true;
00448             CPSFacebook::$_photoList = array();
00449 
00450             try
00451             {
00452                 $_result = $this->_facebookApi->api( '/me/albums' );
00453                 if ( null != ( CPSFacebook::$_photoList = PS::o( $_result, 'data' ) ) )
00454                 {
00455                     $_result = array();
00456 
00457                     foreach ( CPSFacebook::$_photoList as $_key => $_album )
00458                     {
00459                         CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$_key]['photos'] = $this->getPhotos( $_album['id'] );
00460 
00461                         if ( ! empty( CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$_key]['photos'] ) )
00462                         {
00463                             foreach ( CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$_key]['photos'] as $_photo )
00464                             {
00465                                 if ( isset( $_photo['picture'] ) )
00466                                 {
00467                                     CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$_key]['picture'] = $_photo['picture'];
00468                                     break;
00469                                 }
00470                             }
00471                         }
00472                     }
00473 
00474                     CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Saving photos to user table cache...' );
00475                     $_user->photo_cache_text = json_encode( CPSFacebook::$_photoList );
00476                     $_user->update( array( 'photo_cache_text' ) );
00477                 }
00478             }
00479             catch ( Exception $_ex )
00480             {
00481                 CPSLog::error( __METHOD__, 'Exception: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00482             }
00483         }
00484 
00485         $_inProgress = false;
00486         return CPSFacebook::$_photoList;
00487     }

00494     public function getPhotos( $aid, $id = null, $limit = null )
00495     {
00496         static $_recursed = false;
00497 
00498         if ( null == $aid )
00499             return null;
00500 
00501         if ( null == CPSFacebook::$_photoList )
00502             $this->getAlbums();
00503 
00504         if ( isset( CPSFacebook::$_photoList, CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$aid], CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$aid]['photos'] ) )
00505         {
00506             CPSFacebook::$_photoList = CPSFacebook::$_photoList[$aid]['photos'];
00507             if ( ! empty( $id ) ) return PS::o( CPSFacebook::$_photoList, $id );
00508         }
00509 
00510         //  Not there, grab photos and cache...
00511         $_parameterList = array();
00512         if ( null != $limit ) $_parameterList['limit'] = $limit;
00513 
00514         $_url = '/' . $aid . '/photos';
00515         $_resultList = array();
00516 
00517         while ( true )
00518         {
00519             try
00520             {
00521                 $_tempList = $this->_facebookApi->api( $_url, $_parameterList );
00522             }
00523             catch ( Exception $_ex )
00524             {
00525                 break;
00526             }
00527 
00528             if ( $_tempList )
00529             {
00530                 $_resultList = array_merge( $_resultList, PS::o( $_tempList, 'data', array() ) );
00531 
00532                 if ( null != $limit || null === ( $_url = PS::oo( $_tempList, 'paging', 'next' ) ) )
00533                     break;
00534             }
00535             else
00536                 break;
00537         }
00538 
00539         return $_resultList;
00540     }

00545     protected function _forceLogin()
00546     {
00547         //  If this is a deauth, clean up the database...
00548         if ( false !== strpos( $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], 'app/deauthorize' ) )
00549         {
00550             if ( $this->_loadUser() )
00551                 Yii::app()->getRequest()->redirect( 'deauthorize', array( 'id' => $this->_user->id ) );
00552         }
00553 
00554         error_log( 'Force logging out user, no session found.' );
00555         CPSLog::info( __METHOD__, 'Force logging out user, no session found.' );
00556 
00557         //  Logout user...
00558         PS::_gu()->logout();
00559 
00560         CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Facebook login redirect: ' . $this->_loginUrl );
00561 
00562         echo '<script type="text/javascript">window.top.location.href = "' . $this->_loginUrl . '";</script>';
00563         flush();
00564         exit;
00565     }
